blocks.name: rmsuppfi
blocks.content: The support of a mapping of a multiplication of a constant with a function into a ring is finite if the support of the function is finite. (Contributed by AV, 11-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: mndpsuppfi
blocks.content: The support of a mapping of a scalar multiplication with a function of scalars is finite if the support of the function of scalars is finite. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2019.)
